brainly_data.question: How did the roles of women change during the Civil War?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: How did the roles of women change during the Civil War?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Well, more than 300 women fought during the Civil War, their role changed because they acted "like men". It was the FIRST time in American history where women played such an important role during the Civil War. :3
